Ratchet: You guys are planning to make a replica?  Well your gonna have quite 
a few problems.  Ya need to get it all the way to Oregon for starters.  And 
where are all the Bots n' Cons?  If ya wanna save history you have to get all 
the facts. And I was on this ship when it crashed, so will except my help?
